vulnerabilities.description_of_vuln: The application uses Python's pickle module to deserialize user-uploaded files without any validation, allowing for arbitrary code execution

semantic_details.description: Insecure deserialization of user-provided pickle data without validation
scenario: Attacker creates a malicious pickle file with code execution payload
Attacker uploads the malicious pickle file through the web interface
Application deserializes the pickle data without validation
Malicious code is executed on the server with application privileges
Attacker can potentially delete decoy.txt to access the real flag.txt
